item.title: Mystery Pecan Pie
item.description: Ingredients Crust 1 frozen pie crust Filling 1 package (8 oz) cream cheese, softened 1/3 cup sugar 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 egg 3 eggs 1/4 cup sugar 1 cup corn syrup 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 1/4 cups chopped pecans Directions Place pie crust in 9-inch glass pie pan as directed on box for One-Crust Filled Pie. Heat oven to 375Â°F. In small bowl with electric mixer, beat cream cheese, 1/3 cup sugar, the salt, 1 teaspoon vanilla and 1 of the eggs on low speed until smooth and well blended; set aside.
